text.div:
This code system http://jpfhir.jp/fhir/Common/CodeSystem/JP_ProcedureNotPerformedReason_CS defines the following codes:

Code

name: JP_ProcedureNotPerformedReason_CS
title: JP Core Procedure Not Performed Reason
publisher: FHIR Japanese implementation research working group in Japan Association of Medical Informatics (JAMI)

contact.name: FHIR Japanese implementation research working group in Japan Association of Medical Informatics (JAMI)

description: Situation codes describing the reason that a procedure, which might otherwise be expected, was not performed, or a procedure that was started and was not completed.
copyright: FHIR Japanese implementation research working group in Japan Association of Medical Informatics (JAMI)
